## Observation notes  
First documented by Taylor, 1884, with extensive historical record in the Pacific Maritime (see Best list for historical record to 2000). Biodiversity Galiano Life List: (G.G.E. Scudder), 1985, Galiano. Ratti et al. 2008: <span class="hl-place-name">Fraser Valley</span>. Guzman et al., 2023: (Elle), 2005; (Neame), 2007, <span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name">Vancouver</span> Is</span>land</span>.  M. Clausen, Masters thesis: 2017, <span class="hl-place-name">Delta</span>. Guzman et al., 2023: (Elle), 2005; (Neame), 2007; (Wray), 2012; (Gillespie), 2014, 2015; (Kelly), 2017, <span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name">Vancouver</span> Is</span>land</span>. (Button), 2011, <span class="hl-place-name">Abbotsford</span>. (Gehrels), 2013; (Toshack), 2015; (Bobiwash), 2016, <span class="hl-place-name">Lower Mainland</span>. iNaturalist: <span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name">Vancouver</span> Is</span>land</span>, <span class="hl-place-name">Lower Mainland</span>, <span class="hl-place-name">Fraser Valley</span>, from 2015. Note: B. californicus and B. fervidus are conspecific, representing two intergrading colour forms.
